Package org.wmn4j.notation

Class NoteBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wmn4j.notation.NoteBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DurationalBuilder
    public final class NoteBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements DurationalBuilder
    Class for building Note objects. The built note is cached.

    Instances of this class are not thread-safe.

    • Constructor Summary

        public NoteBuilder​(Pitch pitch,
                   Duration duration)
        Constructor.

        duration - the duration set in this builder

      • NoteBuilder

        public NoteBuilder​(NoteBuilder builder)
        Copy constructor for NoteBuilder. Creates a new instance of NoteBuilder that is a copy of the NoteBuilder given as an attribute. This does not copy connections to other builders through markings.
        Parameters:
        builder - the NoteBuilder to be copied

      • NoteBuilder

        public NoteBuilder​(Note note)
        Constructor that creates a builder with the pitch, duration, and articulations of the given note. Ties and connected markings are not copied.
        Parameters:
        note - the note from which pitch, duration, and articulations are copied to the created builder

      • addTieToFollowing

        public void addTieToFollowing​(NoteBuilder builder)
        Tie this builder to a following builder. The builder that this is tied to should be built before this. When the notes are built the Note returned by the call of build on this will be tied to the Note built by builder.
        Parameters:
        builder - The builder for the following note that this is to be tied to.

      • getTiedTo

        public Note getTiedTo()
        Returns the following note to which this builder is tied.
        Returns:
        the note to which this is tied

      • setTiedTo

        public void setTiedTo​(Note tiedTo)
        Sets this to be tied to the given note.
        Parameters:
        tiedTo - the note to which this is set to be tied

      • isTiedFromPrevious

        public boolean isTiedFromPrevious()
        Returns true if this is tied from the previous note or notebuilder.
        Returns:
        true if this is tied from the previous note or notebuilder

      • setIsTiedFromPrevious

        public void setIsTiedFromPrevious​(boolean isTiedFromPrevious)
        Sets this to be tied from the previous.
        Parameters:
        isTiedFromPrevious - the value that defines whether this is tied from the previous note or note builder

      • getFollowingTied

        public java.util.Optional<NoteBuilder> getFollowingTied()
        Returns the NoteBuilder of the following tied note, if there is one.
        Returns:
        Optional containing the NoteBuilder of the following tied note if there is one, otherwise empty Optional.

      • connectWith

        public void connectWith​(Marking marking,
                        NoteBuilder targetNoteBuilder)
        Connects this builder to the given builder with the specified marking.

        The connections set using this method are automatically resolved and built when the note builder is built.

        Parameters:
        marking - the marking with which this is connected to the target
        targetNoteBuilder - the note builder to which this is connected using the given marking

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Removes the cached note that was built on the previous call of build.

      • build

        public Note build()
        Creates a note with the values set in this builder. This method has side effects. The method calls build recursively on the following NoteBuilder objects to which this is tied. Calling this method to create the first note in a sequence of tied notes builds all the tied notes. The Note objects are cached in the builders. In case of tied notes, the temporally first one should be built first.
        Specified by:
        build in interface DurationalBuilder
        Returns:
        a note instance with the values set in this builder.
